setupScript.name: setFocusOnAndTurnOnSwitch
setupScript.description: sets focus on the 'Notifications' switch, and sets its state to 'on'

user: With focus on the 'Notifications' switch, read information about the switch.

instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.
